Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.dao.profileDao

Class ProfileDao

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.dao.profileDao.ProfileDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProfileDao
public class ProfileDao extends Object implements IProfileDao
This class controls all management of the Manager and Customer classes and the persistence of their information
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • insertManager

      public void insertManager(Manager manager) throws SQLException, AccountAlreadyExistsException
      This method allows to insert on the TicketWaveDB, a Manager when registering on the platform
      Specified by:
      insertManager in interface IProfileDao
      Parameters:
      manager - is used when the data is taken from the SignUpView
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a generic SQL exception has occurred
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - if there is duplicate entry error in the database (1062)

    • insertCustomer

      public void insertCustomer(Customer customer) throws SQLException, AccountAlreadyExistsException, GenreNotSelected
      This method allows to insert on the TicketWaveDB, a Customer when registering on the platform
      Specified by:
      insertCustomer in interface IProfileDao
      Parameters:
      customer - is used when the data is taken from the SignUpView
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a generic SQL exception has occurred
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - if there is duplicate entry error in the database (1062)
      GenreNotSelected - when The Customer has not selected any Genre from the SignUpView

    • splitStringToArrayGenre

      private Genre[] splitStringToArrayGenre(String s)
      This method takes a String as input, splits it by commas, and converts each resulting substring into a Genre object. It then puts these Genre objects into an array and returns it.
      Parameters:
      s - input string
      Returns:
      Genre Array where each genre is separated by a comma

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String password)
      This Method takes a user's password as input and returns a hashed version of the password using the BCrypt library.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      hashPassword as a String

    • checkPassword

      public static boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword, String hashedPassword)
      The method checks whether a plaintext password matches a hashed password using the BCrypt library
      Parameters:
      plainPassword - insert by the User
      hashedPassword -
      Returns:
      Boolean True if the Passwords are Matched. Otherwise false.

    • updateManagerSub

      public void updateManagerSub(Manager manager) throws SQLException
      This method update the Manager subscription using a double logic: if subscription has expired (subscription -1),updates database's values. Indicating that subscription has expired if the Manager choose a new Plan, an update is made of the various values based on the plan chosen by the Manager
      Specified by:
      updateManagerSub in interface IProfileDao
      Parameters:
      manager -
      Throws:
      SQLException - when a generic SQL exception occurs
